headline: Why one analyst says Shopify is a buy over its AI use
summary: Loop Capital Markets gets bullish on Shopify (SHOP), upgrading the stock to a Buy and lifting its price target on the e-commerce company.  Loop Capital Markets Managing Director Anthony Chukumba tells Market Domination's Julie Hyman and Josh Lipto that Shopify’s internal use of AI is helping with efficiency and "keeping their expense base pretty stable." Chukumba adds that Shopify has become “even more attractive” to enterprise merchants. However, the smaller businesses Shopify represents still faces hefty competition from retail giants such as Walmart (WMT), with Chukumba believing the big-box retailer to be “hitting on all cylinders in a way we haven't seen for some time.” To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.This post was written by Luke Carberry Mogan.

headline: Abercrombie & Fitch, Dollar General, Peloton: Top Analyst Calls
summary: Wealth host Alexandra Canal takes a look at this morning's analyst calls on several top trending stocks. Raymond James analysts initiated coverage on Abercrombie & Fitch (ANF) with an Outperform rating and price target of $180 per share. Catch Yahoo Finance's recent interview with Abercrombie & Fitch CEO Fran Horowitz. Discount retailer Dollar General (DG) was upgraded to Buy from Bank of America, citing optimism around the chain's "back-to-basics" strategy. Peloton Interactive (PTON) sees gains of over 7% this morning after being upgraded to Neutral by UBS. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here. This post was written by Luke Carberry Mogan.

headline: Why Dollar General Stock Popped 4.5% Friday Morning
summary: Dollar General (NYSE: DG) stock traded sideways after the company reported third-quarter earnings on Thursday, but it's taking a nice leg upward Friday morning.  As of 10:20 a.m. ET, Dollar General stock is up 5%.  Dollar General reported 5% sales growth year over year, with new store openings providing most of the growth.

headline: Trump to Nominate Former Georgia Sen. David Perdue as Ambassador to China
summary: President-elect  Donald Trump  picked former Georgia senator  David Perdue  as his nominee for U.S. ambassador to China, charging the business executive with navigating relations between the world’s two biggest economies on the brink of a fresh trade war.  A self-professed China watcher with extensive corporate experience in Asia, Perdue had been a vocal Trump ally in the Senate and supported efforts to counter perceived military and economic threats from Beijing.  In a statement Thursday, Trump said Perdue “will be instrumental in implementing my strategy to maintain Peace in the region, and a productive working relationship with China’s leaders.”
